titleSection.name: OpsHub Integration Manager for VersionOne and HP Quality Center Integration
titleSection.shortDescription: Integrating VersionOne and HP Quality Center helps you leverage your existing tool chain and reach more people.

descriptionSection.description: Integrating VersionOne and HP Quality Center helps you leverage your existing tool chain and reach more people. This integration helps manage overlap between tools with a two-way flow of work items so that teams can leverage existing test plans, defect tracking, and status reporting, while adding the practice of agile project management.

commercial.shortDescription: The product is stable and supported.
